article.title: Improved feature usage
article.content:
This week we improved the **feature usage** template. It now includes two more granular views: usage per week and per month. We also added goals to it so you can set engagement goals at a single feature level.
**Other improvements** - You can visualize your daily active users for the current day - You can now pick a trait in a pre-populated list of trait dropdown - Show full-time range on cohort tables. - WAU/MAU ratio is available on the [active user template](https://june.so/template/active-users) ![Capture d’écran 2021-03-08 à 09.28.23.png](https://june-changelog.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/Capture_d_ecran_2021_03_08_a_09_28_23_dd65b8ab1f.png) - L30 (average number of days a month your users engage with your product) is available on the [power user template](https://june.so/template/power-users) ![Capture d’écran 2021-03-08 à 09.29.48.png](https://june-changelog.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/Capture_d_ecran_2021_03_08_a_09_29_48_389f2dd0e5.png)
